snippet: Designated hitter Evan Gattis and Houston avoided salary arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $3.4 million contract, with a club option for 2017.
abstract: Houston Astros sign designated hitter Evan Gattis to one-year contract for $3.4 million.
lead_paragraph: Designated hitter Evan Gattis and Houston avoided salary arbitration by agreeing to a one-year, $3.4 million contract, with a club option for 2017.

headline.main: Astros and Gattis Agree to Deal
